billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

title: Authorizes veteran's credits to be added to an individual's civil service examination
summary: Authorizes veteran's credits to be added to an individual's civil service examination.
currentCommittee: VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the application of veteran's credits to civil service examinations
